name: AutoBackground
description: Cycles through background images for chrome weekly, changing from monday to friday and then repeating the next week. The types of background are reliant on the users input into the program

icons.16: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size
icons.48: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size
icons.128: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size

default_icon.16: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size
default_icon.48: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size
default_icon.128: Link to icon, must be appropriate pixel size
